lead_paragraph: Russian swimming chief Vladimir Salnikov said on Tuesday the atmosphere surrounding his team at the Olympics reminded him of the Cold War, and criticized American breaststroke champion Lilly King for attacking the integrity of her Russian rival.

headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Russian Great Salnikov Says Atmosphere Like Cold War
headline.main: Exclusive: Russian Great Salnikov Says Atmosphere Like Cold War

snippet: Russian swimming chief Vladimir Salnikov said on Tuesday the atmosphere surrounding his team at the Olympics reminded him of the Cold War, and criticized American breaststroke champion Lilly King for attacking the integrity of her Russian rival....
